Title: You're on the Essentials plan
Body: Welcome to Essentials. This free plan gives you the basics needed to be successful with OKRs.

Title: Activate username?
Body: They'll have access to your organization's files.

Title: Deactivate username?
Body: Data related to this user will remain visible. They can be reactivated at any time..

Title: Delete username?
Body: Any data related to them will be deleted. This can't be undone.
